name: geeksynergy
description: Node.js application with multiple database connections using Prisma

scripts.prisma:generate: prisma generate --schema prisma/employees/schema.prisma && prisma generate --schema prisma/products/schema.prisma
scripts.prisma:migrate: prisma migrate dev --schema prisma/employees/schema.prisma --name initial && prisma migrate dev --schema prisma/products/schema.prisma --name initial
